trans-unit.source: Writes a series of HTML 3.2â€“specific characters and text to the output stream for an ASP.NET server control.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter"></xref> class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering HTML 3.2 content to clients.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter> class is an alternative to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> class.
It converts HTML 4.0 style attributes into the equivalent HTML 3.2 tags and attributes.
It standardizes the propagation of attributes, such as colors and fonts, using HTML tables.

ASP.NET automatically uses this class for HTML 3.2 and earlier browsers by checking the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.TagWriter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class.
Unless you create a custom page or control adapter that targets devices that use HTML 3.2 markup, you do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter> class explicitly.

For more information about customizing page and control rendering, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter"></xref> class that uses the line indentation that is specified in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.DefaultTabString"></xref> field when the requesting browser requires line indentation.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter.%23ctor%2A> constructor passes the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.DefaultTabString> field value to a second version that has the following two parameters:
`writer`, which takes an instance of the <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> class.
`tabString`, which takes a string that defines line indentation.
The <xref href="System.IO.TextWriter"></xref> that renders the HMTL content.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter"></xref> class that uses the specified line indentation.
The <xref href="System.IO.TextWriter"></xref> that renders the HMTL 3.2 content.
A string that represents the number of spaces defined by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.Indent"></xref>.
Gets a collection of font information for the HTML to render.
The collection of font information.
Returns the HTML element that is associated with the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> enumeration value.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag?displayProperty=fullName> field is passed in `tagKey` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter.ShouldPerformDivTableSubstitution%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter.GetTagName%2A> method returns the `table` element.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> enumeration value to obtain the HTML element for.
The HTML element.
Determines whether to write the specified HTML style attribute and its value to the output stream.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter.OnStyleAttributeRender%2A> method supports a smaller number of HTML style attributes than the <xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter.OnStyleAttributeRender%2A> method that it overrides.
The HTML style attribute to write to the output stream.
The value associated with the HTML style attribute.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterStyle"></xref> enumeration value associated with the HTML style attribute.
`true` if the HTML style attribute and its value will be rendered to the output stream; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether to write the specified HTML element to the output stream.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter.ShouldPerformDivTableSubstitution%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter.OnTagRender%2A> method replaces any `div` elements that are rendered by a control with `table` elements.
The HTML element to write to the output stream.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> enumeration value associated with the HTML element.
`true` if the HTML element is written to the output stream; otherwise, `false`.
Writes any text or spacing that appears after the content of the HTML element.
The spacing or text to write after the content of the HTML element; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, `null`.
Writes any spacing or text that occurs after an HTML element's closing tag.
The spacing or text to write after the closing tag of the HTML element; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, `null`.
Writes any tab spacing or font information that appears before the content that is contained in an HTML element.
The font information or spacing to write before rendering the content of the HTML element; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, `null`.
Writes any text or tab spacing that occurs before the opening tag of an HTML element to the HTML 3.2 output stream.
The HTML font and spacing information to render before the tag; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, `null`.
Writes the opening tag of the specified element to the HTML 3.2 output stream.

If a `div` element is specified and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter.ShouldPerformDivTableSubstitution%2A> property value is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter.RenderBeginTag%2A> method performs basic `table` element formatting to present the content that is contained in the `div` element.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> enumeration value that indicates which HTML element to write.
Writes the end tag of an HTML element to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter"></xref> output stream, along with any font information that is associated with the element.
Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether to replace a `Table` element with a `Div` element to reduce the time that it takes to render a block of HTML.
`true` to replace `Table` with `Div`; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the requesting device supports bold HTML text.
Use the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter.SupportsBold"></xref> property to conditionally render bold text to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter"></xref> output stream.
`true` if the requesting device supports bold text; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `true`.
Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the requesting device supports italic HTML text.
Use the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter.SupportsItalic"></xref> property to conditionally render italicized text to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter"></xref> output stream.
`true` if the requesting device supports italic text; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `true`.
